events.name: Nickel mining
events.wd_description: The process of mining and extracting nickel from its ores.
events.description: The process of mining and extracting nickel from its ores.

events.name: Geology
events.wd_description: The types of ores containing nickel and their geological occurrence.
events.description: The types of ores containing nickel and their geological occurrence.

events.name: Sulfide ores
events.wd_description: Nickel occurs in sulfide ores, with pentlandite being the most important type.
events.description: Nickel occurs in sulfide ores, with pentlandite being the most important type.

events.name: Pentlandite
events.wd_description: The principal sulfide ore of nickel, supplying an estimated 65% of the world's nickel.
events.description: The principal sulfide ore of nickel, supplying an estimated 65% of the world's nickel.

events.name: Other nickel sulfides
events.wd_description: Various other sulfides containing nickel.
events.description: Various other sulfides containing nickel.

events.name: Iron sulfides
events.wd_description: Nickel is often a constituent of iron sulfides such as pyrrhotite.
events.description: Nickel is often a constituent of iron sulfides such as pyrrhotite.

events.name: Pyrrhotite
events.wd_description: An iron sulfide mineral containing nickel.
events.description: An iron sulfide mineral containing nickel.

events.name: Oxide ores
events.wd_description: Nickel occurs in oxide ores, with nickeliferous limonite being the principal type.
events.description: Nickel occurs in oxide ores, with nickeliferous limonite being the principal type.

events.name: Nickeliferous limonite
events.wd_description: The principal oxide ore of nickel.
events.description: The principal oxide ore of nickel.

events.name: Nickel laterites
events.wd_description: Constitutes the largest reserves of nickel ores.
events.description: Constitutes the largest reserves of nickel ores.

events.name: Extraction
events.wd_description: The process of extracting nickel from its ores, often with low nickel content.
events.description: The process of extracting nickel from its ores, often with low nickel content.

events.name: Sulfide ores extraction
events.wd_description: Comminution followed by froth flotation to separate nickel minerals.
events.description: Comminution followed by froth flotation to separate nickel minerals.

events.name: Sulfides of copper
events.wd_description: Copper sulfides separated alongside nickel during flotation.
events.description: Copper sulfides separated alongside nickel during flotation.

events.name: Sulfides of cobalt
events.wd_description: Cobalt sulfides separated during the flotation process.
events.description: Cobalt sulfides separated during the flotation process.

events.name: Sulfides of iron
events.wd_description: Iron sulfides separated during the flotation process.
events.description: Iron sulfides separated during the flotation process.

events.name: Nickel laterites extraction
events.wd_description: Extraction of nickel from laterites using hydrometallurgical methods.
events.description: Extraction of nickel from laterites using hydrometallurgical methods.

events.name: Sulphuric acid leaching
events.wd_description: A hydrometallurgical method to extract nickel and cobalt from laterites.
events.description: A hydrometallurgical method to extract nickel and cobalt from laterites.

events.name: Reduction roast-ammonia leaching
events.wd_description: A hydrometallurgical method involving reduction roast followed by ammonia leaching.
events.description: A hydrometallurgical method involving reduction roast followed by ammonia leaching.

events.name: Smelting
events.wd_description: A method used for high-magnesium silicates in lower profiles of laterites.
events.description: A method used for high-magnesium silicates in lower profiles of laterites.

events.name: Additional methods
events.wd_description: Other methods used in the extraction of nickel from laterites.
events.description: Other methods used in the extraction of nickel from laterites.

events.name: Comminution
events.description: Comminution is the process of breaking down ores into smaller pieces to facilitate further processing.

events.name: Froth flotation
events.description: Froth flotation is a process for selectively separating hydrophobic materials from hydrophilic, used in mineral processing.

events.name: Hydrometallurgical methods
events.description: Hydrometallurgical methods refer to processes involving chemical reactions in aqueous solutions to extract metals from ores.
